description: DVA will pay for physiotherapy services if you hold a DVA Veteran Card - All Conditions (Gold) or Specific Conditions (White).

referral_information.requirements: You need a referral from a GP. In certain circumstances, a referral may also be issued by a health professional as part of a hospital discharge.
referral_information.validity: A referral is valid for up to 12 sessions of allied health treatment or one year, whichever comes first.
